solutionViewModalTitle.title: title text displayed in modal header

modalBodyP1.title: first section of the paragraph in modal body.

modalBodyP2.title: second section of the paragraph in modal body

closeButton.title: text displayed on the modal close button in footer

okButton.title: text dispalyed on the modal ok button in footer
